#summary Console command: browse class
#labels console

= Browse class =

This command display all the records of a class.

== Syntax ==

{{{browse class <class-name>}}}

Where:

 * class-name     The name of the class

== Example ==

{{{
> browse class City

---+--------+-------------------
  #| REC ID |NAME
---+--------+-------------------
  0|    -6:0|Rome
  1|    -6:1|London
  2|    -6:2|Honolulu
---+--------+-------------------
}}}

This is a command of the Orient console. To know all the commands go to [ConsoleCommands Console commands].
